main event: A mysterious object was observed in the sky over Richmond, Virginia for 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed visually from the ground and also detected on radar by a GCI (Ground Controlled Intercept) station.
The object was described as two brilliant lights that alternated flashing, and it reached an altitude of 33,222 feet.
The object moved at a speed of 4 mph and changed direction from northeast to southwest.
There was no sound associated with the object.
The object was observed in overcast weather conditions with a ceiling of 21,000 feet and visibility of 7-8 miles.
